title: wrongfully labled a leaver
body: while playing my last promotion to gold 2, my internet cuts out for 5-7 min. It came back up and i was able to get back in the game and help my team win the game. after that i was labled as a leaver, had 36 LP taken away from me, and a loss put on my promotion. my team even welcomed me back to the game. how can riot continue to use a system that screws people over that have internet problems. i want my LP, my Win, and my promotion back that the system stole from me for no reason. wtf riot.

replies.body:
How can people with internet problems continue to screw over other players by knowingly playing on a highly unstable connections?

4 vs 1 in this case, not to mention there is no way to give a free pass to people who did not leave intentionally without also giving a free pass to every intentional leaver.
i have 100Mb up and down. i have fiber internet. my internet rarly goes out. and if it does is cause someone crashed into a phone poll.
So.. why are you whining about a one-off issue that is outside riot's control as well as yours?
